query: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.city, p.status, COUNT(a.id) as asset_count FROM projects p LEFT JOIN assets a ON p.id = a.projectId WHERE p.name LIKE '%Building Condition Assessment' AND p.id >= 3780825 GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY p.id;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2g8chP3aro94bni.root --database XnmtZZwX6e46H8JVZbq4Ta --execute SELECT p.id, p.name, p.city, p.status, COUNT(a.id) as asset_count FROM projects p LEFT JOIN assets a ON p.id = a.projectId WHERE p.name LIKE '%Building Condition Assessment' AND p.id >= 3780825 GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY p.id;

rows.name: City of Riverside Building Condition Assessment
Town of Oakville Building Condition Assessment
